import React,{Fragment,useContext,useEffect}from'react';import{CSSTransition,TransitionGroup}from'react-transition-group';import BookingItem from'./BookingItem';import BookingContext from'../../context/booking/bookingContext';import Spinner from'../layout/Spinner';var Bookings=function Bookings(){var bookingContext=useContext(BookingContext);var bookings=bookingContext.bookings,filtered=bookingContext.filtered,getBookings=bookingContext.getBookings,loading=bookingContext.loading;useEffect(function(){getBookings();// eslint-disable-next-line
},[]);if(bookings!==null&&bookings.length===0&&!loading){return React.createElement("h4",null,"Please book an appointment");}return React.createElement(Fragment,null,bookings!==null&&!loading?React.createElement(TransitionGroup,null,bookings.map(function(booking){return React.createElement(CSSTransition,{classNames:"item",key:booking._id,timeout:500},React.createElement(BookingItem,{booking:booking}));})):React.createElement(Spinner,null));};export default Bookings;
